about_the_game:
About this Game

True Diner is a game that combines adventure, cooking and elements collection. You will play the role of an adventurer to hunt monsters in the ice and snow, make delicious food, and run the Abyss Canteen. Making friends with diners will help you get Oracles so that you get all kinds of special abilities.
In addition to the common human food, the monsters on this land provide a richer list of ingredients. You will make some unique dark cuisines and meet diners from the abyss. Whether it is food or an Oracle, it will help you go further and deeper on this land far away from human beings...
Yes, the abyss is staring at you.

The Abyss Canteen

In the night by the bonfire, creatures from the abyss will come to visit.
Make delicious dishes using your prey to entertain them! In return, you will receive the gift from the darkness.
With the expansion of recipes and the improvement of cooking technology, special plots will also be triggered.
They will tell you the history of the monsters hidden in the mists.

Wild Exploration

Start from the islands of floating ice to explore this wild continent of ice and snow!
Various mutant monsters and mythical creatures will make your adventure more difficult but interesting at the same time .
The bonfire keeps you safe at night, and the lighthouse helps you discover new lands and extend your journey.

Oracle Worms

Both the abyss canteen and the harvest of wild exploration may produce Oracle Worms. They will form graphics in your brain and bring the blessings of the ancient Gods.
Be careful with these Oracles! While bringing you special effects, they’ll make you pay the price at the same time.
Pay special attention to the impact on your SAN!

Game Features

QTE battle with rich features
Equipment building and backpack management
There are various kinds of monsters, and you get chance to meet female mutant ones
Free combination of Oracle Worms, giving different extraordinary abilities
There’re multiple plots, characters and personal plots waiting for you to explore.

Survival Guide

Danger is everywhere! The more beautiful it is, the more dangerous!
Keep an eye on your sanity and spend the night by the bonfire.
Be careful of Gormandizer! It's better to earn less than to lose everything.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains the following elements: combat, monster corpses, skeletons, bloody or revealing scenes, character deaths, and monster depictions.

detailed_description:
Follow Us

We're excited to announce that our game demo will be available in October! Don't forget to add it to your Steam wishlist!

name: True Diner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz 或 AMD A10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 Ti

short_description: True Diner is a game that combines adventure, cooking and elements collection. You will hunt monsters in the ice and snow, make delicious food, and run the Abyss Canteen. Making friends with diners will help you get Oracles, but it's not a good thing to go too deep into the darkness...
